website_summaries.verdict: Nice price for those seeking a basic grinder. Includes built-in LED lights over each of the wheels.
pros: Motor will spin at an impressive 3,450 rpm maximum speed, especially considering the price
Reduces noise by making use of rubber feet
Cast iron base provides plenty of stability

cons: Not really made for heavy-duty jobs

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality, see my video
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, either the armature is bent or BOTH stones, which would seem odd, that come with the grinder are defective. Machine won't last a year before it burns out from the way it wobbles. See video. I have a SKIL 1/2" drill and a SKIL circular saw that I have had for over 30 years which is why I bought this grinder, the difference is they were made in Japan and this cheap grinder is just more Chinese junk. Sad that SKIL would hang their name on such inferior junky merchandise.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for what you get

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive quality grinder

The rest works fairly well, but it seems like if it was adjustable and I could set an angle to it, then I might get better sharpening. That being said, I tried to be as steady as I can and I'm happy with the results.

But, I had put a wire brush on the left side and it was barely rubbing the wheel guard ..but enough to keep motor turned off . So I ordered a new one . While the old one was off the bench I learned it wasn't broken at all. I put the wire brush wheel back on but left off the guard. Works great. I don't need the guard anyway when cleaning up rusting metal . Many of the older grinders never had wheel guards anyway. WONDERFUL GRINDER for the old man's workshop. Best deal on Amazon. Chuck

Some minor assembly required which is a bit confusing for the beginner with the enclosed instructions. Manufacturer could gave done better job on that part.
